title: (x) spunge sans caps - Dirty Headliner (similar to Bloc) {Petter (self) (Sebastian)}
content:
I’m looking for something similar to this, it does not need to be spot on, just in the same team.  
Thank you.  
P

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [spunge.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108031345/http:/typophile.com/files/spunge.jpg) | 137.58 KB |

 [‹ "As is The Gardener, So is The Garden" ornate blackletter/oldstyle face](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108031345/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38466 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Soma Magazine headline type - Caslon 540 {Stefan Seifert} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108031345/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38422 "Go to next forum topic")
author: plojel

comments.content: Found out that the one in the attached image is called dirty headliner but I cant find a version that works on my mac. So, I’m still looking for something close

Bloc by Paratype should get you there.

[http://www.paratype.com/pstore/fonts/Bloc.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108031345/http:/www.paratype.com/pstore/fonts/Bloc.htm)
Doesn’t [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108031345/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=dirty_headline) work? That’s a normal True Type Font...
That one worked, thank you Marten. Thank you all about seb for Bloc.
